data.description: Expand, renovate, or redesign this fixer-upper into a real estate masterpiece. With approx 1,800 sq ft of potential and the possibility of transforming it into a 4-bedroom, 2-bath haven, this property is brimming with promise. Nestled near the new Burlington Arboretum at Willowbrook Park. Wood floors in the original part of the house, 1178 SF finished living space w/622 unfinished space under construction—no permits pulled. The back section of the house was added back in the 1980s by a previous owner (unknown if it was permitted). The deck was added 8 years ago (unpermitted). The gas is turned off-heat system is inoperable at this time. Unknown as to its condition. The property is to be sold as-is. No repairs or concessions will be given. Whether you're an experienced investor or a savvy homeowner with a vision, this property holds the key to endless possibilities.
